title: Barcelona vs Bayern Munich live stream: how to watch Champions League online from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: Injury hit home side face Nagelsmann’s in-form German champs
article: Arguably the choice match up of Game Week 1 of the new Champions League campaign pits the rebuilding Barca against the on-fire German champions. Follow our guide as we explain how to watch a Barcelona vs Bayern Munich live stream and catch all the action from the UCL, no matter where you are in the world today right now - including ways that you can watch for FREE.
Playing their first Champions League tie since the devastating departure of Argentinian talisman Lionel Messi, the hosts will also be without a trio of injured attacking options for this big game.
Sergio Aguero, Ousmane Dembele and Martin Braithwaite are all unavailable for Barca, making an already difficult task for boss Ronald Koeman even more daunting.

Bayern have been in scintillating domestic form having dished out 5-0 and 1-4 thrashings to Hertha Berlin and RB Leipzig in the Bundesliga, and showing no mercy to lower league Bremer by battering them 12-0 in the cup.

Like his opposite number, Bayern boss Julian Nagelsmann has injury concerns of his own coming into this tasty looking clash, with midfielder Marcel Sabitzer winger Serge Gnabry both doubtful, but the visitors will nevertheless be strong favourites to come away from Catalonia with all three points this evening.
